content: Is there a policy talking points doc available yet? We need this!

Not yet, but we're hoping it comes soon and we'll post it and promote it on the server when it arrives. We're waiting on official campaign platform so we can make sure all volunteers are amplifying the same messaging on policy. Thank you for your patience as we hang tight on this. In the meantime, our Reach app does have single-issue graphics with lots of great talking points.
